reasoning: Anaplastic astrocytoma (WHO Grade III glioma) incidence ~0.5-0.7 per 100k globally from GLOBOCAN/brain tumor registries. Recurrent cases represent subset (estimated 60-70% of initial cases eventually recur). Using incidence for incident cases, though 'recurrent' designation adds prognostic specificity. Metric appropriate for incident tumors.
source: Ostrom QT et al. (2014). CBTRUS statistical report: primary brain and central nervous system tumors diagnosed in the United States in 2007-2011. Neuro Oncol. 16(Suppl 4):iv1-63
